messages.description: It may be possible for the net [Process] to complete without any generated work. Check the empty tasks linking from i to o.
AtomicTask:Node1 the postset of any OR/XOR split must have exactly one default flow (not 0)
AtomicTask:Node1 any flow from any OR-split [AtomicTask:Node1] must have a predicate.
id-22 any flow from any XOR/OR-split [id-22] must have either a predicate or be a default flow.
id-22 the postset of any OR/XOR split must have exactly one default flow (not 0)
AtomicTask:Node1 any flow from any XOR/OR-split [AtomicTask:Node1] must have either a predicate or be a default flow.
